description: The AWS::ElastiCache::ServerlessCache resource creates an Amazon ElastiCache Serverless Cache.

CacheUsageLimits.description: The cache capacity limit of the Serverless Cache.

DataStorage.description: The cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

Minimum.description: The minimum cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

Maximum.description: The maximum cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

Unit.description: The unit of cached data capacity of the Serverless Cache.

ECPUPerSecond.description: The ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.

Minimum.description: The minimum ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.

Maximum.description: The maximum ECPU per second of the Serverless Cache.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with Serverless Cache.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

ServerlessCacheName.description: The name of the Serverless Cache. This value must be unique.

Description.description: The description of the Serverless Cache.

Engine.description: The engine name of the Serverless Cache.

MajorEngineVersion.description: The major engine version of the Serverless Cache.

FullEngineVersion.description: The full engine version of the Serverless Cache.

KmsKeyId.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the cluster.

SecurityGroupIds.description: One or more Amazon VPC security groups associated with this Serverless Cache.

SnapshotArnsToRestore.description: The ARN's of snapshot to restore Serverless Cache.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this Serverless Cache.

UserGroupId.description: The ID of the user group.

SubnetIds.description: The subnet id's of the Serverless Cache.

SnapshotRetentionLimit.description: The snapshot retention limit of the Serverless Cache.

DailySnapshotTime.description: The daily time range (in UTC) during which the service takes automatic snapshot of the Serverless Cache.

CreateTime.description: The creation time of the Serverless Cache.

Status.description: The status of the Serverless Cache.

ARN.description: The ARN of the Serverless Cache.

FinalSnapshotName.description: The final snapshot name which is taken before Serverless Cache is deleted.
